attributes.action: Put traffic light by the West Midlands.  Safari Park
attributes.background: We need to put some traffic light by the west midlands safari park because to many people are getting killed or hurt trying to cross the road

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision on where to position traffic lights on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
